name: Roflnauts 2
description:
Roflnauts 2 was a fan made sequel for Roflnauts, a mini game originally created by Vlambeer, in celebration of the launch of Awesomenauts and Ronimo Games' fifth anniversary.

It was developed by the members of the Awesomenauts forums community including (in no particular order):

  • ParaDox
  • PlasmaWisp
  • MilkingChicken
  • Seltzy
  • Gnarlyman aka Bronkey
  • Burningdillo
  • Aki aka nthirtyone

Project was actively maintained from 2016 to 2018. The final release is available for download for Windows, Mac OSX and Linux platforms. The source code and assets are available through git repositories: hosted at ignore.pl and on Github. The usage of assets is restricted to the Roflnauts 2 project and copyrights are held by the respective authors to the extent that does not interfere with Awesomenauts and Roflnauts copyrights.

Homepage is hosted at ignore.pl.

Awesomenauts are property of Ronimo Games
Roflnauts were made by Vlambeer and include music composed by Fin Send
Roflnauts 2 were made by Roflnauts 2 project team
